name: Markus Westphal-Furuya
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: I've been writing LOB applications based on web technologies for the last 6 year. I admire the pace in which the whole ecosystem is developing and maturing.
what_can_i_contribute: While running after the latest trends/technologies/frameworks is surely a demanding (but also satisfiying) task, one should not overlook the more "universal principles" of software engineering. I hope to be able to talk about those in the context of today's JS world.
